text: Faaninbon damira jiri muwan di lalɔ faaninbon tele kankan bolokinin dɔ. Ai ye woilu ladan, ka siifenju wodigbɛlaman binaanin fanan nadan, mɛnilu bilatɔ damira jiri woilu ju kɔrɔ, damira jiri kelen siifenju fila, baa sen fila mɛnilu ye damira jiriilu bɛɛ ma, woilu bɛɛ ye don siifenju rɔ, sen kelen siifenju kelen.
